transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji. 
Customer: Haan good afternoon sir Vineet baat kar raha hu India Mart head office se Ujjwal se aapki baat hui hogi aapke concern ke liye unka manager baat kar raha hu. 
Executive: Haan sir. 
Customer: Haan sir unse hui baat. 
Executive: Ji aapko sir apna domain change karana tha na? 
Customer: Haan. 
Executive: Sir main ye keh raha hu ki abhi aapne recently hi book karaya hai ye domain? 
Customer: Haan recently karaya tha par wo unhone bataya ki in keyword se koi fark padega par maine search kar kar ke dekha to usse koi fark pada nahi raha. 
Executive: Search fark padega? 
Customer: Jaise keyword search karte hain log google pe ja ke. 
Executive: Hmm hmm. 
Customer: To maine unse rai li thi ki kuch aisa hoga dekhna isme ki in keywordo ki agar wo domain liya jaye to jyadatar grahak us pe land ho sakte hain. 
Executive: Domain agar hum log domain change kar bhi denge matlab as per jo bhi domain aap bol rahe hain aur wo agar client koi keyword search karta hai to domain ki visibility nahi aati hai India Mart ki hi visibility aati hai hum jo visibility dete hain wo India Mart ke upar hi dete hain. 
Customer: Unhone mujhe bata diya ki keyword ka prabhav padega fir maine aise keyword bata diye jinme searching ke jyadatar keyword the. 
Executive: Nahi nahi ye bilkul. 
Customer: Ajeeb ho gaya. 
Executive: Nahi nahi ye to bilkul. 
Executive: Unhone mujhe suggestion kar diya ki haan ye theek hai. 
Executive: Nahi domain ka isse search isse koi lena dena nahi hai sir domain pe to kya hota hai ki client agar man lijiye aapka domain India Mart ke upar 10-15 saal purana ho jaye wo 10-15 saal ki baat kar raha hu main purana ho jaye us pe bahut sare clicks aa jaye to wo to apne aap SEO ho hi jata hai to client jo uske domain ke andar website ke andar jo usme keyword lage hue hain usse visibility aati hai wo bhi sir bahut SEO hone ke baad jo hamare purane purane domain India Mart pe 15 saal 20 saal purane abhi domain se koi visibility nahi aayegi aapki kyuki hum log aise koi sale bhi nahi karte ki domain se hum promotion kare hum domain promote nahi karte hum log to sir aapko services dete hain by leads wagera aur aapki jo visibility aati hai wo directory pe aati hai India Mart ki directory pe. 
Customer: Haan fir sir ye badalna hi hai mujhe naam. 
Executive: Sir ab ye aapne recently book kiya hai abhi to mere ko pata karna padega main isko change kar sakta hu mere according to sir ye change nahi ho sakta kyuki agar aapka domain saal ya do saal purana ho jaye tabhi hum usko change kar sakte hain hum bhi sir call pay karte hain na isko domain ki humne book kiya India Mart ke upar to us pe sir ek bar mere ko baat karni padegi hal filhal me to mujhe lagta hai ki immediately to change nahi ho payega but I will discuss main ek bar discuss karunga theek hai sir main aapko update kar deta hu fir is bare me tab main fir ticket close karunga abhi aapka ticket close nahi karta hu aur ek cheez aur sir aapke jo account manager hai Ujjwal Gupta hai abhi theek hai unka number aap save kar lijiye haan koi bhi koi aapko future me koi problem hoti hai to aap unko call kijiye customer care call pe aap kar sakte hain aapko lag raha hai ki Ujjwal aapka koi solution nahi de pa rahe proper to aap customer care number pe call kar sakte hain. 
Customer: Haan. 
Executive: Theek hai sir. 
Customer: Theek hai. 
Executive: Ya main abhi apne number se aapko whatsapp karta hu kabhi Ujjwal se baat na ho paye to mere ko call kar lijiyega. 
Customer: Theek hai sir. 
Executive: Okay ji thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to change the domain name.

- Customer was misinformed about keyword impact.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified domain visibility and SEO.

- Executive will check domain change possibility.

- Executive provided account manager's contact.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will update customer on domain change.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- domain, keywords, visibility, account manager
